footer.medical-disclaimer-desc: This website is provided for educational and informational purposes only and does not constitute providing medical advice or professional services. Nothing herein should be construed as an attempt to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any condition, illness, or disease, and those seeking medical advice should consult with a licensed physician.

homepage.tracking-desc: Track NAC protocol regimen, myco die-off experiences and more. Respect for your privacy with local data storage. Flexible with support for customizable regimen.
homepage.hero-appexperience-desc: Take the cognactive toolbelt with you on your journey. Install the cognactive mobile web app to your home screen and use it like an app. Compatible with iOS and Android.
homepage.hero-opensource-desc: Cognactive is ready for customization, collaboration and improvements as a global community technological public good.
homepage.hero-subtitle: Open source tools and tech for the anti-fungal and immunomodular NAC protocol.

tracker.start_tracking: Track daily activities and myco die-off experiences for the NAC protocol.
tracker.reset_description: Reset the tracking start date and delete all data.
tracker.reset_confirm: Are you sure? Your progress will be reset. All activity data will be erased. This action cannot be undone.
tracker.reset_error: Something went wrong while resetting tracker data
tracker.install_description: To continue, open this webpage from your mobile device. Then open the Share menu and select 'Add to Home Screen'.
tracker.privacy_text: All regimen activity tracking data (tracking dates, experiences, supplements) is stored locally in web browser and not shared with any third-party.
tracker.privacy_link: Learn more about cognactive Privacy & Data Usage
tracker.legal_text: The cognactive app helps track activities and events and is for personal use only. cognactive is not a medical app. Use this app at your own risk and liability.

dashboard.date_error: Selected date cannot be before the start date or after today.

phase_2_cycle_date.title: Phase 2 Cycle Start / Resume Date
phase_2_cycle_date.description: When did you start or resume phase 2? Setting this date will reset the timer.

phase_2_setup.title: Phase 2
phase_2_setup.description: Once past the 2 month milestone, continue phase 1 as needed or prepare for phase 2 of the NAC protocol.

die_off_symptoms.title: Myco Die-Off
die_off_symptoms.description: Track myco die-off symptoms and experiences

new_symptom.error: Describe your symptom in more detail

symptoms.stool_changes: Change in stool frequency, volume or color

daily_note.prompt: Eat anything special? Do anything different?
daily_note.privacy_notice: Notes are only stored locally on your device
